ComicInfo.Summary: Don't miss the finale of this sin-sational super crossover series featuring Marcia Bolens, the Sexecutioner, and the orgiastic biker nun from P. Skyler Owens's infamous Bad Habits series, Hell Mary! After a couple of false starts, the ever horny tag team is on its way to liberate a kidnapped class of Catholic school girls from the hands of a Satanic bunch of Nazi skinheads... or are they?! The sextravaganza that is Naked Angels ends in this pulse-racing climactic issue, as these two wild and wanton, sexin' and fightin' women put the hurtin' on the bad guys and some lovin' on each other. Hang on to your halo, 'cause this series might make you into a convert!
